author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three men were arrested on Wednesday for damaging property and threatening the owner of a salon in Koyambedu on Tuesday.

Police said Raja, Balaji and Yadav visited a Men’s salon at Koyambedu on Tuesday night and when the owner, R. Babu asked them to pay the bill, the men allegedly refused and entered into an altercation with him. They threatened to take away things from the salon and damaged property after which Babu filed a complaint.
title: Three held for damaging property
